about.title: SHIPPING GL
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Logistics Partner
about.description: Since our founding, SHIPPING GL has been committed to providing first-class logistics services with integrity, reliability and excellence. Our team of dedicated experts works tirelessly to ensure your goods arrive safely and on time.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Satisfied partners across Africa and the world

testimonial1.text: SHIPPING GL transformed our supply chain with their exceptional service and customs expertise. We're impressed by their efficiency and professionalism.
testimonial1.author: Jean Mukendi

testimonial2.text: We trust SHIPPING GL for all our sea freight needs. Their team is responsive, attentive and always ready to solve complex logistics challenges.
testimonial2.author: Marie Diallo

testimonial3.text: SHIPPING GL's customs expertise has saved us considerable time and resources. Their knowledge of local regulations is invaluable.
testimonial3.author: David Nkosi

cta.title: Ready to optimize your logistics?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today for customized solutions tailored to your specific needs

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete logistics solutions for all your needs

airFreight.title: Air Freight
airFreight.description: Our air freight service offers fast and reliable delivery times for your urgent shipments. With our global network of partners, we guarantee secure handling and efficient transport of your air cargo.
features: Solutions for cargo of all sizes

seaFreight.title: Sea Freight
seaFreight.description: Our sea freight service offers economical solutions for transporting bulky goods. Whether you need a full container (FCL) or consolidation (LCL), our expertise ensures the security and efficiency of your sea shipments.

transport.title: Land Transport
transport.description: Our land transport services ensure reliable and timely delivery of your goods locally and across borders. Our modern fleet and experienced drivers guarantee the safety of your goods throughout the journey.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.description: Our secure warehousing facilities offer flexible solutions for storing your goods. With advanced inventory management systems and qualified teams, we ensure the protection and efficient management of your stock.

moving.title: Moving
moving.description: Our customized moving services handle all aspects of your relocation, whether local or international. Our professional team ensures the packing, transport and unpacking of your belongings with the utmost care.

customs.title: Customs Services
customs.description: Our customs clearance expertise allows you to easily navigate through the complexities of customs regulations. Our qualified customs agents ensure compliance and efficiency in your import and export processes.

quotation.subtitle: Get a personalized quote for your logistics needs

about.title: About SHIPPING GL
about.subtitle: Your trusted logistics partner in Africa and worldwide

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At SHIPPING GL, our mission is to provide world-class integrated logistics solutions that simplify our clients' business operations. We are committed to delivering reliable, efficient and personalized service that perfectly meets the specific needs of each client.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to become the reference logistics partner in Africa, recognized for the excellence of our services, our integrity and our constant innovation in logistics and international trade.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our daily actions

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We adhere to the highest ethical standards in all our professional interactions.
integrity.details: Integrity is at the heart of everything we do. We maintain transparency in our communications, honor our commitments and act with honesty in all our business relationships. This fundamental value guides our daily decisions and strengthens the trust our partners place in us.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We constantly strive to improve our services and exceed our clients' expectations.
excellence.details: Our pursuit of excellence drives us to constantly innovate and improve our processes. We invest in training our teams, improving our infrastructure and adopting international best practices to deliver superior quality service.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We keep our promises and take responsibility for our actions.
reliability.details: Reliability is our signature. We respect our deadlines, honor our commitments and fully assume our responsibilities. Our clients can rely on us to deliver their goods safely and on time.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek new ways to improve our processes and services.
innovation.details: Innovation allows us to stay at the forefront of the logistics industry. We adopt new technologies, develop creative solutions and anticipate our clients' future needs to offer increasingly efficient services.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: We place our clients' needs at the center of all our decisions.
customerFocus.details: Our clients are at the center of our strategy. We listen to their needs, adapt our services to their specific requirements and maintain open communication to ensure their total satisfaction.

statement.title: Our Statement
statement.paragraph1: SHIPPING GL aims to operate sustainably, respecting rules and regulations, cultural differences and the environment.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: SHIPPING GL is proud of its diverse team of experienced professionals in logistics, transport and customs. Our qualified staff has in-depth knowledge of local and international markets, ensuring solutions adapted to the specific challenges of each region.

contact.title: Services to Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact the appropriate service directly for your specific needs

quotations.title: Quotation Requests
quotations.description: For all your quote requests and personalized quotations

accounting.title: Invoices and Finance
accounting.description: For your billing, payment and accounting questions

general.title: General Information
general.description: For any general information and inquiries

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded with the vision of revolutionizing the logistics sector in Africa, SHIPPING GL has grown to become a key player in facilitating international trade. Over the years, we have developed unparalleled expertise in navigating the complexities of African and global trade, establishing strategic partnerships that strengthen our ability to serve our clients with excellence.

news.title: SHIPPING GL News
news.subtitle: Stay informed about our latest news, events and developments in logistics in Africa

hero.title: Our Loyal Partners

unicef.description: Our collaboration with UNICEF ensures the fast and secure delivery of essential supplies for children in the most remote areas.

undp.description: In collaboration with UNDP, we contribute to sustainable development through innovative logistics solutions.

unfpa.description: Partnership for the distribution of medical and reproductive health supplies.

monusco.description: Partnership for peacekeeping operations in DRC.

msf.description: Partnership for emergency medical aid delivery.

mercyCorps.description: Partnership for humanitarian aid and development.

saveTheChildren.description: Collaboration for aid to vulnerable children.

cordaid.description: Collaboration for development and humanitarian aid.
